page.title: 01General Review
page.content: The block that we are working on is in South Yorkshire,quite close to the border with Nottinghamshire.Rotherham is about 6 miles to the north-west and Sheffield about 10 miles to the west. The area consists mainly of farmland used for either pasture or for growing cereals.As a contrast to this there is a colliery and quarry,as well as an industrial estate. Within the block there is a section of the M18 motorway.There are also parts of the link roads between the M18 and the M1. There are 5 settlements or parts of settlements.These vary between old, stone-built villages and 20th Century pit villages containing mainly Council and NCB housing.
